冠す: (かんす) - (vs-c,vt)   to crown/to cap; to prefix with/to start with/to begin with
冠する: (かんする) - to crown/to cap; to prefix with/to start with/to begin with
冠たる: (かんたる) - best; matchless; peerless; unparalleled; unrivalled
冠る: (かむる) - to put on (one's head)/to wear/to have on/to pull over (one's head)/to crown (oneself); to be covered with (dust, snow, etc.)/to pour (water, etc.) on oneself/to dash on oneself/to ship water; to bear (e.g. someone's debts, faults, etc.)/to take (blame)/to assume (responsibility)/to shoulder (burden); to overlap (e.g. sound or color); to be similar/to be redundant; (of film) to be fogged (due to overexposure, etc.); (of a play, etc.) to close/to come to an end; (of a play, etc.) to get a full house/to sell out; (of a play, etc.)  to blunder/to bungle/to fail; to be deceived
冠を付ける: (かんむりをつける) - to put on a crown
